directions: Combine cabbage, carrot, mayonnaise, cranberries, walnuts, milk, cider vinegar, and sugar in a bowl; stir well. Cover and refrigerate until chilled, about 4 hours.
ingredients: 1 small head red cabbage, thinly sliced and chopped
1 tablespoon milk, or more as needed
1 teaspoon white sugar, or more to taste
title: Red Cabbage Slaw
